#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int re(int n) {
	int ans = 0;
	while(n > 0) {
		ans = ans * 10 + n % 10;
		n /= 10;
	}
	return ans;
}

int check(int n) {
	string s;
	int temp = re(n);
	if(temp == n) return 1;
	return 0;
}

int main() {
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	int n;
	while(t--) {
		int iter = 0;
		cin>>n;
		while(!check(n)) {
			iter++;
			//cout<<n<<"\n";
			n = n + re(n);
		}
		cout<<iter<<" "<<n<<"\n";
	}
	
}
